value:
$WmMPID_カゲロウ,ch05_13_Kagerou_F_Normal,Face|$w0|We cannot afford to lose. Even if our
fate is worse than death, we will
never give up on Hoshido!$k$p

$WmMPID_サクラ,ch05_18_Sakura_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I won't let you pass! The people
ahead are too p-precious to me!$k$p

$WmMPID_タクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Know that so long as there is a single
breath in my body, I will not let you
pass.$k$p

$WmMPID_ヒノカ,ch05_26_Hinoka_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I applaud you for making it this far,
but your journey ends here.$k$p

$WmMPID_サイゾウ,ch05_12_Saizou_M_Normal,Face|$w0|No matter your reason, I cannot allow
you to pass. Saizo the Fifth strikes!$k$p

$WmMPID_リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You have done well to come this far. I
will stake my life to protect the
Hoshidan wonder secreted ahead!$k$pStrike, if you dare!$k$p
